response.overview: The Tamil suspense thriller is based on the life of a young man, who relocates to his natives after resigning from his job in Dubai. He sets up a business with his three friends. After the involvement of the fifth person, a series of unusual happenings take place. The movie is fast and entertaining. The movie has been shot in Dubai, Kerala and Tamil Nadu, and it is definitely worth a watch.
response.title: Thottal Vidathu
